channel.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
channel.description:
Hey guys I was wondering how I could make a vote command.. Like if someone were to type ::vote then it would bring up the vote screen on runelocus or here. I was also wondering how to make like an announcement bot? Like make it say "[announcement] Server was reset due to duping" I'm sure these are very simple but I don't know how to add them.. Any help?
~Splinter

item.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

Yeah I’ll pm you the info

Read full topic

item.source: How to make a vote command and announcements

item.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

You can make one that works on a timer. So it would say it every 2 mins or somthing.

Add this to the top of your client.java - public int tellTimer = 300;

Now search for public void process() {

Under that, add this code, changing the words in " " to whatever you want.

if (tellTimer > 0) { tellTimer -= 1; } else if (tellTimer <= 0) { sendMessage("[Server] Go and vote on google.com!"); tellTimer = 300; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a vote command and announcements

item.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Yes you have to be logged in for it, and you type in ::message “Whatever you want the message to say” and it will automatically pickup the text you put afterward and that will be the message.[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

To vote for my private server

BTW I got a question… For the snippet you gave me does it say it automatically even when I’m offline or do I have to say ::message? and where do I change what it says?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a vote command and announcements

item.title: How to make a vote command and announcements
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]For the announcement this is a snippet from the source I am using which should give you a general idea. Also about the vote screen, Did you mean to vote for your private server on a private server voting site or to vote on something in game?

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }[/font]

Read full topic
